downloadDescription: Download Service Pack 2 for Microsoft® SQL Server® 2014
detailsSection:
Microsoft SQL Server 2014 service packs are cumulative updates and upgrade all editions and service levels of SQL Server 2014 to SP2. This service pack contains up to and including SQL Server 2014 SP1 Cumulative Update 7 (CU7).

This download site contains the following packages and service patches for the Microsoft SQL Server 2014 SP2 release:

  • Microsoft SQL Server 2014 SP2 Update - this package contains the Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Service Pack 2 update to be applied to existing SQL Server 2014 installations.

To evaluate SQL Server 2014 SP2 on a new instance of SQL Server 2014 Evaluation Edition, please goto Microsoft Evaluation Center for SQL Server 2014 SP2 Slipstream installation packages.

Microsoft SQL Server 2014 SP2 Documentation:

  • Microsoft SQL Server 2014 SP2 Release Notes
  • Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Privacy Statement
  • Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Systems Requirements
systemRequirementsSection:
• For complete system requirements, please reference the detailed Systems Requirements page
  • 6 GB of available hard disk space for the Service Pack update, 10 GB for a Slipstream installation
  • Service Pack 2 can be applied to any of the following Microsoft SQL Server 2014 editions:

    • Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Enterprise
    • Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Developer
    • Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Standard
    • Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Business Intelligence
    • Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Web
    • Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Express
installInstructionSection:
Note: You must have administrative rights on the computer to install SQL Server 2014 SP2.

Microsoft SQL Server 2014 SP2 Update:

  1. Review the Microsoft SQL Server 2014 SP2 Release Notes
  2. Download the following file from the "DOWNLOAD" section on this page to your device:
    • SQLServer2014SP2-KB3171021-architecture-language.exe
  3. Once the download is complete, click RUN to begin the installation process immediately or SAVE to install at a later time.
additionalInformationSection: If you have questions about SQL Server 2014 SP2, please visit the SQL Server 2014 SP2 forums on MSDN. Your feedback is important. Help improve SQL Server 2014 SP2 by submitting bugs to Microsoft Connect.
